item.title: Starting the 3D Printer Journey
item.author: Karl
item.description: Starting the 3D Printer Journey Printer Head The two things that really inspire me are exploring and creating. Exploring can be traveling or doing something new, trying something out. Creating is about making something new. For me, this usually means either modifying something that already exists (improving) or building together something with exciting pieces. As a kid, I loved legos, and legos are how I think about creating. Legos pieces can be code, computer chips, or kitchen cabinets.
